metadata.description: Mightier than a god, dumber than a rock. After a centuries-long slumber, mythology's greatest dragon awakens to find his treasure stolen and the world transformed into an unrecognizable place. Now Fafnir the Dragon must wade through this insane new world to reclaim his gold while battling the US Army, Paris Hilton, Gangsta-rappers, and America's greatest superhero in an adventure that one reviewer describes as 'South Park meets Jurassic Park!'
metadata.name: Fafnir the Dragon
